name: A Gentlemans Journey
description:
Ah, sir! You’ve arrived! Good evening, I shall be your host tonight. I’m terribly sorry that I’m not able to take your coat for you, but at the very least I can be with you in spirit. You undoubtedly came to see my master’s extensive collection of magical artifacts.

Unfortunately, as you slept, one of the more powerful items has become…unruly, and is doing things it shouldn’t. It has turned the mansion into a labyrinth. You’ll find it in the basement, Sir. Perhaps you can show it what-for!
